text:
RELIGION

Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple : Thirupallioda thiruvizha, Namperumal purappadu from sanctum sanctorum in pallakku, 6.30 a.m.; reaching Vaniya Mandapam, 9.30 a.m.; purappadu from the mandapam in tholukiniyan, 5 p.m.; reaching yanai vagana mandapam, 5.45 p.m.; purappadu in Yanai vaganam, 8 p.m.; returning to yanai vagana mandapam, 9 p.m.; reaching sanctum sanctorum, 10 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Sri Venugopalan Sannidhi, Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple, 6 p.m.; 24, East Chithra Street, Srirangam, 7 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam : Sri Rama nama parayanam, III Main Road, Renga Nagar, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

District Administration: Public grievances meeting, K.S.Palanisamy, presides, Collector’s Office, 10 a.m.

Tiruchi Corporation : Civic grievances meeting, A.Jaya, Mayor, presides, Corporation Office, 11 a.m.

AIMAN College of Arts and Science for Women : Special address by M.Jafar Sadiq, assistant professor, Jamal Mohamed college, noon

Holy Cross College : Annual parents forum meeting, 11.30 a.m.

M.A.M. College of Engineering : Paper presentation contest on Innovation of engineering and technology, M.A.Mohamed Nizam, college secretary, inaugurates, 10 a.m.

St.Joseph’s College Department of Physical Education : Centenary tournaments – football, S.Ganesamoorthy, Assistant Commissioner of Police (Law and Order), Fort, inaugurates, 7 a.m.
title: tiruchi today
